name: Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Inspect for damage and wear, Confirm items are correct as per drawings and Specifications
Acceptance Criteria - Items are approved as per contract specification
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Set out completed by an approved surveyor marked allignment
Acceptance Criteria - Allignment set out matches drawing C4400 or aggreed with the Engineer
Frequency - Prior to commencement of works
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Approved Material, AP20 as per DCC code of subdivision 10329.
Acceptance Criteria - As per DCC code of subdiviison 10329
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Excavate to required depth to invert as per C4400
○ Trench width to allow for 300mm seperation between springline of the pipe and trench wall or an adjacent pipe
○ Floor of Trench to be even across width and length
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Scala tests on base of trench
Acceptance Criteria - Minimum of 2 blows per 100mm
Inspection Type (Visual, other) - Visual, On site test
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Bedding minimum 150mm compacted material
Acceptance Criteria - Bedding to comply with requirements
Inspection Type (Visual, other) - Visual, Measurement Check
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - MHs to be installed true to the design level
Acceptance Criteria - Final levels are in accordance with the C4400 or within tolerance and agreed with the Engineer
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Benching concrete shall have a crushing strength of 20MPa at 28 days.
○ Benching shape to have smooth transitions at bends and junctions
Acceptance Criteria - Benching built up to the specifications
Inspection Type (Visual, other) - Visual, Test Results
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Backfill in 200mm layers of compacted material
○ Compaction testing one test every two layers as required
Acceptance Criteria - 95% MDD in roads, paths, and pavements
Verifying Document - Photos, Compaction test results
Inspection Type (Visual, other) - Visual, On Site test
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Manholes to be water tested up to within 150mm of the concrete lid level.
Acceptance Criteria - The amount of water leakage from chamber under test shall not exceed 1/300 of the volume of the chamber during a 30 minute period
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Complete mark up of any changes from project drawings
Verifying Document - Red pen markup drawings
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Inspect for damage and wear, Confirm items are correct as per drawings and Specifications
Acceptance Criteria - Pipes shall be DN150 SN16 PVC-U rubber ring jointed
○ Items are approved as per contract specification
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Set out completed by an approved surveyor marked allignment
Acceptance Criteria - Allignment set out matches drawings or aggreed by the Engineer
Frequency - Prior to commencement of works
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Approved Material, AP20 as per DCC code of subdivision 10324.
Acceptance Criteria - As per DCC code of subdiviison 10324
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Excavate to achieve required depth to invert as per drawing C4400
○ Floor of trench to be even across width and length
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Scala tests on base of trench
Acceptance Criteria - minimum of 2 blows per 100mm
Inspection Type (Visual, other) - On site test
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Pipe installed to grade as per drawing C4400
Acceptance Criteria - Pipe not damaged during installation
○ Pipe installed to grade within tolerances specification GP 3.1.8
Verifying Document - Photos, Grade check sheet, Survey of position for as-built
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Lateral connection as per drawing C4410
Acceptance Criteria - – Lateral connection as per drawing C4410 and DCC standard details and project specs.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Embedment material AP20 or approved by the Engineer in writing
○ Where required (trenches with >5% slope) AP20 stabilised with cement hall be used (40kg cement to 1000kg aggregate)
Inspection Type (Visual, other) - Visual, measurement check
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Backfill in 200mm layers of compacted material
○ Compaction testing one test every two layers as required
○ Conductive signal strip to be laid at 300mm above pipe
Acceptance Criteria - 95% MDD in roads, paths, and pavements
Verifying Document - Photos, Compaction test results
Frequency - During Installation, compaction testing per 50m of pipeline or per straight section of pipeline
Inspection Type (Visual, other) - Visual, On Site test
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - CCTV inspection to confirm pipeline conforms with specification
Acceptance Criteria - Pipeline will fail is any of the following is visible:
○ Pipe misalignment or deformation more than 5% of the pipe diameter
○ Dips or ponding of water inside the pipe
○ Defects such as open joints, potruding laterals, cracked barrels, or similar
Verifying Document - Test Records, CCTV footage
Frequency - Every section of pipe completed
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Tested in the presence of the Engineer or their representative testing in accordance with AS/NZS 2566.2 Section 6.4
Frequency - Every section of pipe installed
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Complete mark up of any changes from project drawings
Verifying Document - Red pen markup drawings
Frequency - After completion of pipe section
